issue.title: [Docs][FlightRPC] Improve Flight documentation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16065](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16065). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
- The format docs for Flight should reflect the changes made in ARROW-15921.
   \* "RPC Methods" should also describe DoExchange
   \* How do we want to describe non-gRPC transports?
   \* Authentication should be expanded
   \* External resources should link to the more up-to-date blog
  
  In C++/Python/Java:
   \* We should at least have a basic page outlining the process of setting up a server and a client
   \* Longer examples should go in the Cookbook over the documentation
   \* Document how to return/handle errors, how to check cancellations, set timeouts, etc.
